argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( p e. Prime -> p e. ZZ ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> p e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zsqcl | |- ( p e. ZZ -> ( p ^ 2 ) e. ZZ ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( p ^ 2 ) e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( A e. NN -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( B e. NN -> B e. ZZ ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> B e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_dvdsmultr1 | |- ( ( ( p ^ 2 ) e. ZZ /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( p ^ 2 ) || A -> ( p ^ 2 ) || ( A x. B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 6, 8, 9 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( ( p ^ 2 ) || A -> ( p ^ 2 ) || ( A x. B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_reximdva | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) -> ( E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || A -> E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || ( A x. B ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_isnsqf | |- ( A e. NN -> ( ( mmu ` A ) = 0 <-> E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || A ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) -> ( ( mmu ` A ) = 0 <-> E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || A ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_nnmulcl | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) -> ( A x. B ) e. NN ) |
| 15 |  | #P_isnsqf | |- ( ( A x. B ) e. NN -> ( ( mmu ` ( A x. B ) ) = 0 <-> E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || ( A x. B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) -> ( ( mmu ` ( A x. B ) ) = 0 <-> E. p e. Prime ( p ^ 2 ) || ( A x. B ) ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 13, 16 | #P_3imtr4d | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) -> ( ( mmu ` A ) = 0 -> ( mmu ` ( A x. B ) ) = 0 ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN ) /\ ( mmu ` A ) = 0 ) -> ( mmu ` ( A x. B ) ) = 0 ) |
